body.p: The covered by this document contains and restricted by individual license terms.

This document is part of the which addresses the obligations deduced from the . The software distribution is made available or transferred only in corresponding combination with the software distribution annex.
The component licenses and notice files are provided as part of the software distribution annex. Individual license texts may be omitted in case the terms are restricting the distribution.
License obligations of the individual components, as far as these can be addressed in documentation, are detailed in section .
